competitors.name: Akamai
competitors.notes: Industry leader with 325,000+ servers in 135+ countries, 1,400+ network systems, excels at large-scale traffic and enterprise security

competitors.name: Amazon CloudFront
competitors.notes: AWS CDN with 1,600+ edge locations, includes DDoS protection via AWS Shield, SSL/TLS encryption, seamless AWS integration

competitors.name: Fastly
competitors.notes: Fast and reliable with strong security controls at the edge, real-time updates, Gartner Customer's Choice for WAF and API protection

competitors.name: Imperva
competitors.notes: Comprehensive cybersecurity platform with WAF, DDoS protection, and advanced bot management for web applications and APIs

competitors.name: Google Cloud CDN
competitors.notes: Cloud Armor WAF with OWASP Top 10 rules, real-time Cloud Logging integration, competitive pricing at $0.02-$0.08/GB

competitors.name: Sucuri
competitors.notes: Specializes in malware removal, WAF, DDoS protection, and SSL support, includes WordPress-specific security scanner

competitors.name: Bunny.net
competitors.notes: Top choice for small to mid-size sites wanting enterprise-grade speed with transparent pricing and hassle-free control

competitors.name: Microsoft Azure CDN
competitors.notes: Single billing with Azure, direct integration with Azure logging and monitoring, good for enterprise Azure customers

context: Cloudflare, Inc. is a cloud services and network security company focused on CDN, DDoS protection, edge computing, and Zero Trust security. AI inference at edge. Workers AI and R2 storage growth.
